summary.description:
Quantifying Neurodegenerative Progression With DeepSymNet.

A data-driven method based that identifies longitudinal changes in 3D structural MRI data without relying on prior brain regions of interest, an atlas, or non-linear registration pipelines.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'Quantifying Neurodegenerative Progression DeepSymNet', 'ADNI'
summary.name: DeepSymNet
